QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when idle_disconnect_timeout_in_seconds <= 600 then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  title || ' idle disconnect timeout in seconds is set to ' || idle_disconnect_timeout_in_seconds || ' seconds.' as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_appstream_fleet;
